name: VR Audio Visualizer
description: You are welcome to enjoy an incredible world of sonic virtual reality. Look at visualization of your favorite songs and melodies with 6 impressive visualizer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 282 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 282 MB available space
